article.headline: Netflix Inc. stock falls Tuesday, underperforms market
article.body: Shares of Netflix Inc. NFLX, +1.43% slipped 2.84% to $505.87 Tuesday, on what proved to be an all-around poor trading session for the stock market, with the S&P 500 Index SPX, +0.87% falling 1.40% to 3,360.97 and Dow Jones Industrial Average DJIA, +0.56% falling 1.34% to 27,772.76. Netflix Inc. closed $69.50 short of its 52-week high ($575.37), which the company achieved on July 13th. The stock demonstrated a mixed performance when compared to some of its competitors Tuesday, as Amazon.com Inc. AMZN, +3.01% fell 3.10% to $3,099.96, Walt Disney Co. DIS, +1.53% fell 1.98% to $120.93, and Comcast Corp. Cl A CMCSA, -0.99% fell 2.35% to $44.51. Trading volume (4.0 M) remained 1.6 million below its 50-day average volume of 5.6 M.
